author: Amarnath Tewary
text:
After BJP MP and actor Shatrughan Sinha gave embarrassing moments to his party by praising Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar, another BJP MP on Friday lauded Mr. Kumar and his “commitment to the State’s development.”

“Bihar is on the path of development under Nitish Kumar. There is no doubt about the intentions of the Bihar Chief Minister as he is a gentleman and has a clean image,” said the BJP Rajya Sabha MP R.K. Sinha.

Mr. Sinha , though, advised Mr. Kumar to focus more on law and order situation in the State.

Mr. Sinha has been in the BJP for a long time and is also a successful businessman.

Earlier, Shatrughan Sinha, the Patna Sahib MP, had praised Nitish Kumar and RJD chief Lalu Prasad much to the discomfiture of the BJP. A few days back, Mr. Sinha had met both leaders in Patna and invited them to his book launch function.

Another Bihar BJP MP from Darbhanga Kirti Jha Azad too had earlier lauded Nitish Kumar’s governance. Mr. Azad had exposed the alleged scam in the Delhi District Cricket Association (DDCA) and questioned the role of BJP leader Arun Jaitley.

No one can doubt his intentions as he is a gentleman and has a clean image, says R.K. Sinha
title: Yet another BJP MP praises Nitish
